captions.text: EXID UP&DOWN
#hashtag Interview - Artists pick keywords about themselves
# Interview 31st EXID
Who's that girl?
EXID, hello this is EXID!
Our first hashtag is #UP&DOWN
Since everyone is talking about having "something" with someone
So the song's about the ups and downs of that
It's asking the other person to be frank
You wrote the song, right LE?
It's not supposed to mean anything sexual
Not at all
I didn't write it alone
I wrote it with the Tiger
I keep going up and down
Why don't you know, don't you know, don't you know
Show me how you feel
Why don't you know, don't you know, don't you know yeah
Did I start on the right note?
Yes, it was great
We stopped performing the song, but it returned to charts
Show us how we felt
We got a message
and we all went...
What?
The song ranked in the 70s then 60s
Then 50s, 30s...
And suddenly it was in Top 10
I said, guys something's up
Something's up
Something good
Something good has happened
Q. Reactions to the rank changes?
In 50s
Top 10
2nd Place
Yeah, that's how I was
How embarrassing
But our goal with "UP&DOWN" was...
to do well enough so we can make the next album
Just that much
We had a very small dream
Because we really wanted to start performing with a new album
Not doing anything for 2 years
And we're all really optimistic people so
We were satisfied with how we did
Yes, we had fun so that's all that matters
I thought it was great enough that we weren't forgotten
It was fun
Oh you mean like, I wish I had this member's upper body
Can it be just one part?
One, two, three
Jung hwa got 3 votes
Thank you, thank you
I like yours too
Thank you
Yours are...
She's the youngest but her body is really feminine
I should be protecting her...
Was I too blunt?
It's like femininity flows through her body
Like her legs too...
But we're talking about her upper body
I'm trying to steer away from that
Her upper body the best in the team.
(Q. Then whose lower body is the best?) One, two, three
Thank you, thank you
No one picked me
No one voted for me
Something happened here...
I didn't get any votes either
For both upper and lower bodies
It's alright
Our faces are our best features
I'm sure there are other charms about us
Our hairs or something...
Thank you
EXID's hottest body, congratulations!
Our next hashtag is #Summoned
It's a summer son, but we've been summoned back this winter
So here we are...
Usually we are forced off the stage
Forced
It feels great to be experiencing this
I hope we get summoned to end of the year ceremonies...
I wish we could just go and sit there
We don't even have to get anything, we'll just watch
You know what, let's not take on this reputation anymore...
We can totally make it there
Our best performance was at the Duty Police Festival
They reacted very well to our stage
They really cheered us on, and sang along to UP&DOWN
They lost their voices when we were there
They kept saying, "My throat hurts" but when the song came on
Up down, up up down
So hilarious
Our next hashtag is #Legendary_fanshoot
I think this all began with the legendary fan shoot video
of Hani
Our heroine
Dear Pharkil
He's the person who recorded her
Thank you, we couldn't have done this without you
Please keep supporting us!
Let's meet up sometime...
I figure out the angles
that make my face look the best
When I see someone recording me
I tilt to this angle
Oh, it's like you measured it
No wonder she kept tilting her head...
We have to tilt this way when we dance
But she kept tilting the other way by herself
No, I can tilt that way in the same angle
Show us the face you made that had all the guys go crazy
I saw it, she goes right before my part
She does this thing...
She has this face
I want to see, I want to see!
Our next hashtag is #Skilled
One of the best composers in our company, right here
Thank you
Her voice is unique
When people hear her voice, they know it's LE
That's it, isn't it? Yeah
Yes, yes that's it!
A squeezy voice
All the members imitate me pretty well
Why don't we take turns imitating her?
Stop that
Alright, let's go!
I don't get it, your eyes pretending to be innocent
You pick me up then put me down
Then I feel loco
Makes me crazy, I've been forced on
Rollercoaster
Oh no, what are you doing!
I think I just saw Kim Sook there
Do we look alike?
Embarrassing
I have a special skill that no one else can do
What?
Voldemort
It's the best
No one else can pull it off
First I have to tie my hair
Okay, one, two, three
No one else can do that
I... can't do it
Go you!
Fly me to the moon...
Fly me to the moon
Fly?
Like that...
Two birds with one stone style!
Lip sync!
Why do you try to shake me up again?
The phone rings all night, oh no no no oh no no no
Thank you
Hani was checking out her body
Hot body! Hot body!
Be careful, she wants all of you, up and down
Scary, scary
Our next hashtag is #LEGGO
It means "Let's go"
LE says "Leggo" before she starts rapping
We thought it's unique so that's how the name came about
We had a chance to meet our fans after some performance
The fans who were there at the site
But on the internet, it looked like...
we're in this empty park...
We're standing there and the fans are squatting in front of us
I guess that made people feel bad for us
After we debuted, one of our fans told us...
Since that picture is still going around online
When we become more popular, we should take another one
in the same spot, just to prove...
There, we'd like to see all those whom we can call LEGGO
We still might look a little silly but...
with everyone's love, we'll become even better than now
We'll try our best to be the sweetest group for you
We've been on break for a long time
so we know how to appreciate our fans
We're really grateful for what we have
Let's LEGGO together
Come on, come on
We'll be performing UP&DOWN a little more it seems
Thank you so much for all the interest in the song and us
We'll try harder to become the EXID you love and want
This is EXID on hashtag
EXID LEGGO! Bye!

EXID :)﻿

Omg, I just love them in this videos. They seems natural, not fake, funny 
and a bit boyish girl group especially Hani. More importantly, they look 
like they are real friends together. Humble and optimistic but yet

singer, a good rapper, a lead vocal, visuals and maknae. They deserve more 
popularity, hopefully with the next comeback. ﻿

comments.author: CharleyKaKa

comments.text:
These girls are really charming! I found myself to be desperately fond of 
them after only a short time! I am so appreciative of how frank they are. 
Honestly, they deserve endless amounts of much recognition and support! 
Clearly they're very dedicated and even though they have modest ambitions, 
they obviously enjoy working towards those goals and do so with pride. Each 
of the girls is charismatic in their own way, and the group dynamic between 
them is beautifully balanced. With this healthy group atmosphere and their 
amazing talent, they are truly able to be shining stars! Please, oh, please 
let them become more popular! <3﻿
comments.author: BABTNGDMDD

comments.text: They’re so pretty and with so talent. ﻿

comments.author: Gustave154

comments.text:
i've really fallen in love with exid over the past year, year and a half. i 
really hope this attention they're getting now (bout time) lasts for longer 
than just for this song. they are all so talented and i want them to put 
out an album already! 2 years was too long for these talented ladies to be 
idle!﻿
comments.author: kyeoptawerk93

comments.text:
I don't know about you guys, but for me, EXID is one of those groups who 
has the skills, personality to shine in the industry. I mean, they have 
underground rapper LE for Pete's sake, who can contribute greatly in terms 
of composition and whatnot. I find them really interesting as a group and 
as individuals. It's sad knowing that Up & Down was released after a 2 year 
break and knowing that they only want to to do good enough so they can 
start preparing for their new album. This just shows that they are serious 
about their music. Yedang Entertainment should push them to promote an 
album, if not consistently singles. I mean, if you want people to remember 
you, you girls should release single by singe. Look at SISTAR. Not even 
months after Touch My Body, they released I Swear. Though the song wasn't 
as commercially successful as the previous, it made people remember them 
more since they appeared again to promote their single. EXID fighting <3 ﻿
comments.author: Farhan Norazwan

comments.text:
LE is a lyrical genius.

SOLJI has that power voice, she can be in Immortal Song.

HYERIN is a cutie-patootie chic.

JUNGHWA is an UNDERRATED VISUAL.

And of course my HANI can be the next SEX GODDESS like HYUNA if she 
promoted well.﻿
